question:
To protect a metal surface without changing the way it looks

Choices:
A: Spray a few coats of automotive clear coat on the area
B: Spray a few coats of black spray paint on the area
steps: First, identify the main objective of the question which is to protect a metal surface without changing the way it looks.

Consider the properties of the different options given. In option A, spraying a few coats of automotive clear coat is known for providing a transparent protective layer that helps in preventing corrosion and other damage without altering the appearance of the metal surface.
In option B, spraying a few coats of black spray paint provides protection but it also changes the color and appearance of the metal surface.
Comparing both options, automotive clear coat (option A) meets the requirement of protection without changing the appearance, whereas black spray paint (option B) does not.
Hence, option A: Spray a few coats of automotive clear coat on the area, is the correct answer.
